inn1.comm: first ball, pitches on a length on off, Dilshan lets that one through to the keeper
a touch wider from Zaheer this time, Dilshan isn't interested in that one either, no hint of movement either in the air or off the pitch yet

massive misunderstanding, that's the end of Dilshan, he inside-edged the ball onto his pads and it bounced away towards Yusuf Pathan at square leg, Dilshan set off for the run Jayasuriya wasn't interested but Dilshan wasn't taking no for an answer, Yusuf has time to take a few steps towards the stumps and then throw them down, catches Dilshan about a yard out
outside off, Sangakkara shoulders arms to that, the ball moves in after passing the stumps
much closer to the stumps, but Sangakkara isn't tempted into playing that one either
again left alone by Sangakkara, this time the ball swings away but again only after passing the stumps
starts off with a length ball, pitching just outside of, Jayasuriya gets forward and defends
on middle and leg this time, watchfully defended back to the bowler by Jaysuriya
Shot! you don't expect Jaysuriya to keep blocking the bowling, especially when provided width, he crashes it over the covers for the first boundary of the innings
this was fuller on the pads, Jayasuriya tucks it away behind square for two
a foot outside off, Jayasuriya shoulders arms  to that one
back of a length on off, Jayasuriya taps it back to towards the bowler
outside off, Sangakkara lets go his fourth straight delivery
Sangakkara comes down the track, but doesn't offer a stroke again to Zaheer's short of length delivery
gets bat on ball this time, good length from Zaheer and just around off, Sangakkara guide it to backward point
Zaheer gets the ball to come in towards Sangakkara, who reverts to shouldering arms to deliveries outside off
Zaheer continues his tight over with  a ball that comes in a touch after pitching just outside off, Sangakkara defends
and that's a maiden, Sangakkara tries to force the ball pats mid-off but can't beat the fielder
Jayasuriya is rapped on the pads, big appeal for lbw, that pitched on leg stump, but might have been going too high for the umpire's liking
on the pads, going down leg, wanted to flick it but doesn't connect with it
fuller outside off, the Jayasuriya shuffles across and lashes that through extra cover
defended off the backfoot, opens the face of the bat and guides to point
good length delivery, defended back onto the pitch
outside the off stump, wanted to defend it but was beaten by the away movement
outside off and moving away, gets behind the line and defends it to the bowler
slightly on the shorter side, Sangakkara gets on the backfoot and pushes it towards mid-off
well oustide off, Sangakkara is content to let that one through to the keeper
similar line from Zaheer, Sangakkara doesn't offer a shot to that one either
closer to the stumps, and a touch shorter, Sangakkara punches it towards extra cover
on middle and leg this time, flicked away to the left of mid-on, that's the first runs off Zaheer
nice tight line from Munaf, on a length, Jayasuriya gets a big stride in as he defends it
just a bit more width, Jayasuriya walks across and bludgeons that over cover, doesn't worry about getting to the pitch of  the ball
much closer to the stumps this time, Jayasuriya squeezes that towards third man
a similar ball to the one Jayasuriya thwacked over cover earlier in the over, Sangakkara is content to leave it alone
back of a length, some movement back into the batsman, Sangakkara lets that one go by playing inside the line of that
keeping it close to off, Sangakkara gets on the front foot and taps it towards extra cover
tests Jayasuriya with the bouncer, the batsman was looking to get on to the front foot, surprised by the shorter ball, defends it towards point
on the offstump, shuffles across and pushes it towards midwicket
back of a length ball, pitching well outside off but a hint of movement into the batsman, Jayasuriya flicks it towards midwicket for a single
length ball, Sangakkara was looking for a tip-and-run single,  but second slip came in quickly to cut that off
width provided, Sangakkara cover drives on the up, Raina flings himself to his left to keep the batsman down to a single
closer to the stumps this time, Jayasuriya gets behind the line and defends it
starts off with a short of a length ball on off stump, Sangakkara gets nicely behind the line of the ball and blocks it solidly back to the bowler
angling away from Sangakkara, who lets that one sail through to the keeper
good start from Ishant, on target straight away, that one pitched on off, no width for the batsman to work with, and he shoulders arms
similar length, on middle and leg, Sangakkara taps it back to the bowler
Lovely shot from Sangakkara, length ball, slight amount of room for Sangakkara, and he cracks that through extra cover for a boundary
fuller delivery, pushed towards cover off the backfoot by Sangakkara
length ball on middle stump, Jayasuriya walks across the stumps and tickles it very fine down the leg side for a boundary
Zaheer reverts to an outside off stump line, Jayasuriya steps down the track and punches it towards mid-off
back of a length ball, angling across Jayasuriya who lets that go through to the keeper
fuller ball, just outside off, moving away with the angle, Jayasuriya isn't interested  in that one either
length ball, similar line from Zaheer, and that's the third straight ball Jayasuriya shouldered arms to
Zaheer finishes the over with a ball on middle and leg, Jayasuriya looks to repeat that glance to fine leg but doesn't connect
short of length ball on off stump, Sangakkara stays on the backfoot and cuts it towards third man for a single
front-foot no-ball, short ball on leg stump, Jayasuriya wanted to push it towards off but got a bottom edge on to his body
overpitched on off, Jaysuriya gives himself room to thwack that over the offside, gets a thick top edge and the ball flies over slip for a boundary
short of a length, no space to free his arms, Jayasuriya jabs it towards cover point
tests Jayasuriya with the short ball again, on middle and leg, Jayasuriya jumps as he defends the ball down the pitch
slightly fuller than the last one, and on off stump, Jayasuriya is again on the backfoot and he pushes it towards cover
length ball, outside off, Jayasuriya drives it square but can't beat the man at cover point
width provided for Sangakkara, who slaps that hard but Yuvraj  Singh dives to his right at backward point to keep the batsmen down to a single
Jayasuriya doesn't worry about footwork as he lashes that uppishly between extra cover and mid-off, cries of "Catch it", but it bisects the fielders and runs away for four
Jayasuriya's eye lit up as he spotted a wide ball from Munaf, he tries to slam that through the offside but gets a bottom edge which bounces back to the bowler
Trademark Jayasuriya shot, pulled from outside off over wide mid-on for a boundary
tight line from Munaf this time, defended off the backfoot by Jayasuriya
short ball, just outside off , Jayasuriya tries to repeat the pull for four, this time he doesn't quite get hold of it, and it runs towards the mid-on filder
overpitched outside off, Sangakkara reaches out to drive that through the covers, can't beat the fielder
Ishant pegs away at a back of a length, this time on middle and leg, Sangakkara is content turning it towards midwicket
in the channel outside off, Sangakkara punches it off the backfoot to cover
short ball on off, Sangakkara drops it at his feet with soft hands, fine over from Ishant so far
a repeat of the previous delivery, five dots balls so far in this over
same length, this time on middle, Sangakkara is pinned on the backfoot as he works it towards midwicket
slower ball outside off, Jayasuriya shuffles across and looks to flick it towards flick leg, inside edges on to his pads
Sangakkara tips it towards Yuvraj Singh at backward point, the batsmen steal a quick single
attempts a slower one again, misdirected down the leg side
action replay of the previous ball, poor bowling from Munaf, particularly because fine leg is up in the circle, any bat on that and it will be an easy four
length ball outside off, Jayasuriya looks to launch it over wide mid-on, mistimed by Jayasuriya so it doesn't go all the way to the boundary
again Jayasuriya looks to thrash  it through the leg side, a bit of an inside edge as it runs towards mid-on
swinging away from Sangakkara after pitching on middle, batsman gets behind the line and defends
space provided for Sangakkara to free his arms, he drives it towards cover to get a single and retain the strike
on middle and off, defends back to the bowler
driven off the backfoot to point
back of a length ball from Ishant, no width at all for Sangakkara, who has been struggling to get a move on
similar ball from Ishant, Sangakkara taps it with soft hands towards mid-off, batsmen pinch a quick single
that'll be 13000 runs for Jayasuriya, he guides a wide ball outside off towards third man
defended off the front foot towards cover, a bit of confusion over whether to take a single or not, batsmen finally decide against it
bowling from around the wicket, back of a length, Jayasuriya tips it towards mid-off and the batsmen scurry through for a single
wide outside off, Sangakkara square drives it past a diving Yuvraj, but Yusuf Pathan is there to field it in the deep
similar ball, Sangakkara glides it towards backward point, where Yuvraj Singh does the fielding
punches back towards the bowler by Sangakkara, Zaheer gets down well to cut it off
comes forward and pushes it towards Suresh Raina at cover
Sangakkara advances down the track, Zaheer sends down a short ball, Sangakkara isn't fazed by that, cracks it powerfully past mid-on for four
starts bowling around the wicket, defended back to the bowler by Jayasuriya
Jayasuriya gets behind the line of the ball and defends
wide outside off, Jayasuriya lets that one go
closer to the stumps this time, poked towards the covers by Jayasuriya
nicely tossed up Ojha, on a length outside off, Sangakkara steps out and drives towards long-off
turned away towards midwicket, Jayasuriya runs the first one hard, and pushes Sangakkara into taking the second
flights the first ball, driven by Sangakkara through covers for two
a touch short, not enough room for Jayasuriya to get power behind the cut, it  is stopped by Yuvraj at backward point
tipped towards Raina at covers, Jayasuriya calls for a tight single, he would have been gone if Raina had hit directly
defended back to the bowler
turned towards square leg for an easy single
speared in towards offstump, Jayasuriya gets on the front foot and punches it towards cover
pitching just outside off, on a length, defended by Sangakkara
dances down the track and crashes it towards long-off, Gautam Gambhir cuts it off at the boundary
single towards cover point
defend off the front foot towards cover, no run this time
shorter ball from Ojha, not much flight this over, Sangakkara rocks back and pushes it to mid-on
not much space for the cut, Jayasuriya still cuts but straight to the fielder at backward point
A tip and run single to cover, both batsmen set off for the single immediately after Sangakkara played the shot
drifting down the leg side, paddled away very fine by Jayasuriya for a couple
wide outside off, a ferocious cut by Jayasuriya, placement isn't too great and that fetches him only a single
punched off the backfoot to the bowler
the length keeps Sangakkara on the backfoot, this time Sangakkara turns it between mid-on and midwicket
just outside off, pushed to cover by Jayasuriya
Ojha has bowled a good length so far, Sangakkara taps it to the bowler's right for a single
on leg stump, defended by Jayasuriya
punched towards cover point, misfield by Rhit Sharma allows the batsmen to take a single
onto the backfoot and drive n to long-off for a single
the singles keep coming, this time Jayasuriya pushes to cover
on legstump, Sangakkara blocks it back to the bowler
Jayasuriya backs away to give himself some width and cuts it behind square for yet another single
tapped back to the bowler by Sangakkara

tapped towards cover point, there's some confusion in the calling, the batsmen finally set off for the single, a direct hit from Rohit Sharma at the non-striker's end, third umpire is called into action, Sangakkara though has made his ground
length ball, bit of extra bounce for Yusuf, Jayasuriya defends off the backfoot
similar ball, similar response from Jayasuriya, blocked back to the bowler
big appeal for lbw after Jayasuriya is rapped on the pads, but the umpire gives it not out as it was sliding down the leg side
Sangakkara continues to use his feet well to the spinners, walking down the track to drive to  long-on
Jayasuriya is kept on the back foot, he defends back to the bowler to remain on 49
outside off, Jayasuriya shuffles across to get behind the line and defend
closer to the stumps, more defence from Jayasuriya
forces it through the covers to reach his 68th ODI half-century
Ojha ends a tight, accurate over with a length ball on offstump, Sangakkara prods ti towards point
paddle swept from outside off by Jayasuriya for a single
glanced towards fine leg for another single
backs away from the stumps to give himself space to cut, gets himself a single
Sangakkara stands tall as he drives down to long-off for another easy single
Jayasuriya shimmies down the track but inside edges it back to the bowler
driven limply to the bowler's right, Yusuf gets across and cuts it off
length ball on off, turned to short midwicket by Sangakkara
down the track and driven in the air by Sangakkara for a single to long-on
driven hard and can't beat short cover
a bit of width, this time he beats the infield but it cut off on the boundary
inside edged on to the pads, thinks of a single but the batsmen decide against it
driven towards cover for another single
angling into the batsman, driven firmly but straight to extra cover
adjusts late to play it behind point, straight to the fielder again
full on the pads, driven to midwicket for a single
Jayasuriya continues his back-away-and-cut routine, which gets him another single
defended this time to the off side
patted back to the bowler, that ends another tight over from Yusuf
Well, something had to give, Jayasuriya dances down the track and launches that to the sightscreen for six
tries to repeat the stroke, but gets a thick inside edge towards square leg for a single
blocked back to the bowler
turned to square leg for a single
looking for his favourite cut, but is beaten
Jayasuriya pushes it towards long-off, calls for two immediately, but the batsmen finally settle for a single
punched towards deep covers, Jayasuriya gets the two he wants this time
swept from middle stump, some footwork from Munaf at backward square leg keeps the batsmen to two
on middle and leg, turned behind square for a single
gets in the front foot and drives back to the bowler
fires it on middle, Sangakkara comes down the pitch to whip it towards deep midwicket
that one is shorter from Yusuf, Jayasuriya stays in the backfoot and the short-arm pull sends the ball on it's way to the midwicket boundary
width provided, Sangakkara waits on the backfoot and pierces it the infield with a cut, sweeper on the boundary cuts it off
nice placement from Sangakkara again, whipped off this pads after getting to the pitch of the ball, Ishant had some work to do at the midwicket boundary
very wide outside off, Sangakkara guides it delicately towards third man, another couple and the batsmen are panting for breath
a cheeky paddle from middle stump by Sangakkara, another two runs added to the SL total
length ball on off, defended back down the pitch by Sangakkara

Sangakkara's gone! he was coming down the track, Ojha fired it in short, Sangakkarra didn't reach the pitch of the ball, tried to loft over mid-on anyway, didn't get the elevation he wanted and Suresh Raina takes a simple catch
Jayasuriya looks to slog a full ball over midwicket, doesn't connect
full toss on leg stump, swept by Jayasuriya for a single
worked to the leg side for a single
swept for a single behind square
driven fiercely though covers by Kandamby, it's a slow outfield, and the ball doesn't go all the way, batsmen take three
Kandamby defends it to the leg side
tossed up on leg stump, Kandamby turns it to short midwicket
flighted again, on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
shuffles across the stumps to work an outside off ball to midwicket
on leg stump, Jayasuriya prods it towards square leg
maintain the line on the pads, Kandamby advances a few paces down the track, gets an inside edge on to his pads and it balloons in the air but lands safely
Jayasuriya comes down the pitch but defends it back to the bowler
cautiously played towards cover by Jayasuriya
and again Jayasuriya plays it straight to the fielder at cover
a powerful cut this time as he is given some width to free his arms
reaches out to flick, miscued towards the fielder at short cover
Kandamby turns it towards square leg to get himself a single and retain the strike
flighted, full on offstump, jabbed towards point
length ball on off, defended watchfully off the front foot
similar line, Kandamby walks across and turns it to short midwicket, calls for a single but then sends Jayasuriya back
played to extra cover, another dot ball, four of those in this over now
and another, this time wide outside off and Kandamby pokes it towards point
pushed to the leg side, fielder at short midwicket does the fielding to complete a maiden for Rohit
drops it short, that sat up to be hit, Jayasuriya rocks back and launches it wide of mid-on for a boundary
tries a similar shot, bottom edged to midwicket
driven to long-off for an easy single
the short-arm pull from Jayasuriya again, doesn't get hold of it, nearly balloons to Yuvraj Singh at midwicket
driven down to long-on this time by Kandamby
cut off the backfoot over cover fielder for a single
rocks back and smacks that down to long-off, Ishant does the fielding, Jayasuriya slips as he turns for the second
Jayasuriya goes for the big pull again, doesn't connect with it
swept powerfully to the square leg boundary,Zaheer is unable to cut it off
stays on the backfoot and punches it to long-off for another couple to move into the nineties
swept to fine leg for a single
tossed up, length ball outside off, Kandamby prods it towards point
backs away and cuts it behind point as he has done all day today
full ball on off, punched to short cover
guided towards deep point this time for a single
Jayasuriya picks up an easy single by pushing it through the covers
shorter ball, Kandamby punches it to midwicket
another dot ball as Kandamby doesn't gets his placement right, the drive goes to the fielder at short cover
inside-out drive, in the air through the covers, Ojha makes a diving stop at the boundary
width provided and cut away for a single
Kandamby keeps it simple, shows the full face of the bat as he drives to long-off
Jayasuriya tries to pull, doesn't get hold of it
comes down the track and pushes the ball down to long-on for a single
Another single for Jayasuriya as he cuts it towards the boundary, he wanted the second but was sent back by Kandamby, Jayasuriya struggling with cramps here
gets forward and pushes it to the leg side, no run
punched back to the bowler by Kandamby
cuts it to sweeper cover for a single
shortish ball, outside off, not much turn, Jayasuriya is beaten as he plays down the wrong line
dot ball to end the over, Jaysuriya taps it back to the bowler
backs away to give himself room to cut, gets himself a single

gets to his century with a trademark cut past a diving point fielder, it's been a superbly-paced innings from Jayasuriya, not the typical explosive knock as the pitch didn't allow him to play his natural game
Another cut behind point for a two
on the pads, Jayasuriya sweeps fine for a single
Kandamby comes down the track and whips it past midwicket, there was two runs in that but Jayasuriya was exhausted, he just about manages to walk the single
full on middle stump, swept for a single
slower, short ball on leg stump, Jayasuriya only manages to get that down to fine leg for a single, Ishant lucky to escape with giving away only one run on that
Ishant returns to the short-of-a-length on off stump attack which served him well in his first spell, Kandamby defends it back to the bowler
this time strays onto his pads, Kandamby gets his foot down the pitch and whips that wide of mid-on for a boundary
And that's the end of the partnership, Kandamby looks to launch the ball over the mid-off fielder, gets it high on his bat, and it results in a simple catch to Zaheer Khan
tests him with a bouncer outside off first ball, Maharoof lets it go
a bit of away movement after pitching on a back-of-a-length, Maharoof was drawn towards it but gets his bat back in time to let it through to the keeper
Jayasuriya looks to whack the first one over mid-off, doesn't get the timing right, clears Munaf at mid-off, who chases it to keep the batsmen to two
That's a big wicket, full toss, slower ball outside the off stump, Jayasuriya doesn't get the required elevation and holes out to  Munaf at mid-off
Jayawardene flicks a leg-stump ball to midwicket to get off the mark
full ball, Maharoof drives firmly, but straight to the fielder at mid-off
pushes it to cover, that gets him off the mark as well
straying on the batsman's pads, and Jayawardene picks up an easy single by helping it towards short fine leg
back of a length, wide outside off, Jayawardene cuts it to backward point
slower delivery outside off, Jayawardene drops it at his feet and sets off for a single

cleverly disguised slower ball from Ishant, Maharoof was backing away to give himself room, Ishant follows him, their no space for Maharoof to free his arms, he only manages to push it back to the bowler
thsi time Maharoof's backing away works, it was a middle stump ball and Maharoof cuts it to the sweeper for two
again gets his front foot out of the way, Ishant fires in a full ball on off, Maharoof creams that square for a boundary
slower ball outside off, Maharoof had backed away too far and that one goes through to the keeper
very full, just outside off, Jayawardene tries to squeezes it to third man but doesn't connect
slower ball, short of a length on off stump, Jayawardene tips it towards cover and gets a single
another slower ball, this time full and on middle stump, Maharoof does his usual stepping-away-from-the-wicket routine, manages to get it away to mid-off
similar ball, almost a yorker on middle, Jayawardene can only dig it out back to the bowler
length ball outside off this time, Maharoof tries to thrash it through the off side, can't beat the man at mid-off
full and outside off, Jayawardene lashes that to the sweeper on the boundary
Jayawardene inside-edges on to his pads, ball trickles to down the track to the right of the pitch, batsmen pinch a quick single
length ball on off, Maharoof make contact this time, whacks it over extra cover, one  bounce and into the fence
slower, shorter ball that followed Maharoof, his pull ends up trickling away towards fine leg
full and wide outside off, nudged toward third man
slower ball, wide outside off, Maharoof, predictably had backed away, and adjusted at the last moment to cut that towards point
very slow ball outside off, Jayawardene can't get his bat on that, bounces once more before going to Dhoni who struggles to collect it
Full ball on offstump, driven down to long-off
nicely tossed up, full on middle, Jayawardene plays it inside out to mid-off
length ball, just outside off , Maharoof tips it towards cover, thinks of a single but decides against it
similar ball, similar shot, played with softer hands this time and the batsmen pinch a single
guided to short third man for a single
overpitched on leg stump, Jayawardene comes down the pitch and drives to long-off
slow yorker on offstump, Maharoof digs it out to mid-off
Saw Jayawardene backing away and wanted to bowl outside off, but that was too wide for the umpire's liking
length ball just outside off, Jayawardene gives the charge and swings at it, he's beaten and the ball goes through to the keeper
back of a length, on off stump, Jayawardene guides that to third man for a single that brings up Sri Lanka's 200
full toss outside off, Maharoof thrashes that down the ground off the front foot, Ishant had some ground to cover at long-off before cutting it off
length ball on off, punched to extra cover, Maharoof pushes Jayawardene for the single which helps him retain strike
starts with a slower delivery on off, tapped towards cover for a single
that's the end of Jayawardene, length ball well outside off, and the Sri Lankan captain attempts an ugly across-the-line hoick, gets a top edge which balloons to Rohit Sharma at mid-on
slammed towards deep backward point, superb running from the batsmen, they manage to  take two
driven down to long-off, an easy single for Maharoof
angling into the batsman's pads, Kapugedera gets off the mark with a dab towards mid-on
slower ball to end the over, outside off and Maharoof tries to glides it to third man, doesn't connect
big flight from Ojha, Kapugedera inside edges towards square leg
overpitched on middle and leg, Maharoof comes down teh track and lashes it to mid-off, batsmen manage to pick up two
a touch shorter from Ojha, Maharoof stays on the backfoot and cuts it to backward point
length ball on off and middle, another easy single results from a nudge towards cover
Shot! Sri Lanka needs more of these clean strikes from Maharoof, he takes a few steps down the track and launches Ojha over the sightscreen, timing was fantastic on that shot
rounds off the over with a couple to long-on
short of a length outside off, Kapugedera jabs it down to third man for a single
slower offcutter, Maharoof was going for the big heave over midwicket after getting his front foot out of the way, gets an inside edge and the ball crashes into his stumps
short of length on off stump first up, defends towards cover
yet another slower delivery from Ishant, lofted over mid-off by Thushara
Ishant keeps bowling the slower one, Kapugedera went for the booming drive but he is also beaten
he's not beaten this time, gets hold of the length ball and smashes it over the midwicket boundary for six
full ball on off, squeezed towards point
slow yorker on leg stump, Kapugedera crashes it straight to Ishant at mid-on, a direct hit at the non-striker's end would have caught Kapugedera short
slower delivery, pitching on a length and off, Thushara picks it early and launches it into the crowd behind long-on, superb timing
fires the bouncer in, Thushra slams it uppishly towards long-on, bounces short of the fielder
full ball on off stump, Kapugedera drives it to long-off
Thushara whacks it to midwicket, straight to the fielder and no run results
yorker length delivery on the stumps, Kapugedera digs it out to deep cover
full toss on offstump, Kapugedera crashes it down the ground, Yusuf Pathan does the fielding at long-off

Wow, how on earth did Thushara survive that, his attempted swipe over midwicket balloons towards mid-on, Yusuf is running in from the boundary, Raina running back from midwicket, Raina calls for the catch, but strangely doesn't go for it at the last moment, the ball lands right in the middle of both fielders
slower delivery, Thushara manages to squeeze it out to point

Kapugedera digs out a yorker towards Raina at extra cover, and sets off for a single, Raina pounces on the ball and throws down the stumps, third umpire is called for, after many,many replays he decides that it's out
not quite as Ishant oversteps, that's his second no-ball, and it will be a free-hit to finish the innings
a full toss outside off, Thushara goes for a wild swing, he misses and the ball sails through to the keeper which means Sri Lanka finish on 246

inn2.comm: Kulasekara strays on the pads and Gambhir eases it away down to fine leg, not the best place to bowl to him
he bowls it slightly wide of the offstump and there's an opportunity for him to chase it but he watchfully lets it go
and again, very similar delivery outside off and Tendulkar lets it go to the keeper
the ball skids through and holds its line before reaching the keeper, he shuffles across the stumps and shoulders arms
his first attempt at a shot and he chops it down to the off side
it stays up fairly high on him to go for the punch but he doesn't find the gap, backward point does the fielding
great start for Thushara, he gets the ball to kick up alarmingly and it slices Gambhir in half, he nearly gets an inside edge to the keeper
a little slower in pace and outside the offstump, he shoulders arms
Gambhir walks down the pitch and tries to carve it down the ground for four but he mistimes it, he still fetches three though
lands it on a good length outside off and has Tendulkar poking at it
strays on the pads and Tendulkar can't resist the chipped shot which beats mid-on and midwicket comfortably
angles it across the right hander and Tendulkar opens the face of the bat  and glides it past backward point
fullish in length outside off and he gets on the front foot and drives to cover
skids it through on a full length and he ,mistimes the drive yet again to cover
slower ball on the pads and he tries to flick it away but plays too late, the ball trickles off his pads
commits forward and attempts a stylish drive but he fails to pierce the gap past the covers
gets ready to play another elegant cover drive but once again he finds cover, Mubarak is in  the field as a substitute
loses his radar and sprays it wide down the leg side, a little too far for him to nudge it away
this time he deliberately plays with an angled bat and pushes it away wide of backward point
chance but a tough one! Tendulkar hangs his bat out to a ball which kicks up on him and the outside edge just beats Jayawardene at third slip who dives
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
drifts on the pads and he clips it away wide of square leg and looks for the second run quickly

not the best decision unfortunately but Tendulkar has to go, the ball pitches marginally outside the leg stump and straightens and hits him fairly high on the pad as he tries to work it to the on side, Kumar Dharmasena thinks about it for a while before raising the finger, this is Dharmasena's first decision in ODIs
this one keeps a little low but he stays at the crease and defends
he cleverly bowls the shorter one and Raina's in no position to evade it, he tamely fends it off to the on side
continues over the wicket and the ball skids towards his pads, he pushes it firmly towards mid-on
gets his front pad across and immediately shoulders arms
angles it towards the pads and he clips it away down to square leg
Gambhir gets aggressive and it pays off, he chips down the track early and picks his spot, a full delivery is scooped over extra cover

Gambhir was in doubt as to whether he took it cleanly or not, a leading edge lobs low towards Kulasekara's right and he just manages to get his fingers under the ball, from the naked eye it looked like a bump catch and Gambhir stood his ground, the Sri Lankans were convinced but the umpires chose to consult the replays, the camera from the bowler's end indicated that he had taken it fairly cleanly but the angle from the batsman's end wasn't so convincing, nevertheless he gets the benefit of the doubt
gets forward and works it to the off side
clips it to the on side and they take a quick single, the thrown rebounds off the stumps and they take an extra run with nobody backing up on the off side
pushes it towards the off side
risky shot but he gets enough elevation, he checks his chip to the on side and the ball just clears midwicket
Dropped: Slightly short and wide and he cuts hard straight to Dilshan who fluffs a straightforward chance at backward point, he doesn't drop too many
defends down the pitch
taps it softly and thinks of a single but Raina's isn't interested
lovely shot, Kulasekara overpitches on off and middle and Raina shows the full face of the bat and caresses it wide of mid-on, the follow through was sound
full on the off stump and defended firmly
similar delivery and he commits to the front foot early and defends to the off side
poor delivery and rightfully dispatched, it lands on the half volley outside off and he shows the full face of the bat and eases it past mid-off this time, the ball's finding the sweet spot
takes the aerial route and does well enough to clear the  long-on boundary, he picks a full delivery and lofts it through the line, stand and deliver
comes round the wicket, he tries to nudge it fine but the ball hits him on the pads but outside the line of the leg stump
nudged off the pads to the on side
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
angles it in to the left hander from outside off and he defends again
bangs it short of a length down the leg side and he opts out of the shot
makes him stay on the backfoot with another short of a length delivery, he hops at the crease and defends
hits a good length on the off stump and he defends and decides against the single
gets high  on the backfoot and punches it back down the pitch
Maharoof comes on, he angles it down to third man and pushes for the second run but they stick to the single
continues over the wicket, he gets behind the line and punches it through the line back to the bowler
just about angles it towards the pads and he works it wide of square leg
Dropped A little harsh to call it a drop really, Gambhir steps down the track and the outside edge flies high over Jayawardene's head at first slip, he leaps up and only gets his fingertips to it
tucks it to the on side for a single
keeps it short of a length and he defends with soft hands
a little slow in pace, he lunges forward and defends it away
strays on the pads and he tries to get some wood behind the ball but it clips his pads and beats Sangakkara who dives to his right
gets a bit of width to work with outside off but he reaches out and mistimes the cut to point
poor delivery, he gives him way too much width outside off and a mere forward push is enough to beat the gap between mid-off and cover, that brings up the fifty
pushes it with soft hands to the off side
bangs it in short and the ball fizzes towards his helmet, he swivels and hooks it safely down to fine leg
slower ball on the pads and he works it back towards the bowler
invites a booming straight drive but he fails to beat the bowler yet again, Maharoof nearly flings it back to the stumps
Gambhir gives the charge but Maharoof cleverly drops it short and forces the batsman to withdraw the shot
shapes it on the pads and he comfortably works it away down to deep square-leg
straightens on middle and leg and he uses his wrists effectively to flick it behind square on the on side
poor shot and not the best ball either, Gambhir stays rooted to the crease and tries to slice a slower ball wide of the off stump and fails to make contact
good length on the pads and he tucks it away wide of square leg
full and angling on the pads and he clips it away to the gap between the two fielders on the on side, Gambhir wants two and they get it
very cheeky and equally effective, Gambhir picks the short delivery early and deliberately upper cuts it over Sangakkara, that's confidence for you, super shot
defends to the off side
wide down the leg side and left alone
slower in pace and he angles it down to the covers
lands it on a length outside off and he gets his bat nicely behind the ball to defend
bowls the slower ball and Raina does well to pick it as he checks his drive to the covers
cranks up the pace and he drives it firmly to mid-off, Murali hits the stumps at the bowler's end but the batsman is home
defends high on the body and places it straight to backward point
Raina plays a shot in frustration after four dot balls and nearly throws it away, he tries to mow a short delivery over square leg but misses it completely
wide outside the off stump and he angles it wide of third man, picks up a couple
plays a late cut wide of third man and pushes hard for the second but Raina wisely sends him back
he tempts him with a short ball but Raina doesn't fall for the trap and he opts to defend, there are two fielders in the deep for the hook/pull
another short one but this time he shuffles across and taps it to the on side, steals a quick single
wide outside off and carved to third man
short and wide outside off and Raina hops at the crease before slicing it over backward point, third man mops up just before the rope
gives him width outside off and he slices it to backward point
lands it full outside off and he toys with the bowler by opening the face of the bat and gliding it wide of the keeper
and again, he thrives on the late cut and picks up an easy single to third man
Raina however plays him with a straight bat and punches it to cover
doesn't pick the slower ball well and hence he mistimes the drive, he places it back to the bowler
pitches it up on middle and leg and he defends
gets width outside off and he tries to biff it past the off side but finds Kapugedera at cover
gets well forward and smothers the spin
full outside off and defended to the off side
strays wide down the leg side and wide called
Mendis doesn't get any turn, the batsman just pushes it to the off side
straightens again and he defends back to the bowler
gets forward a little too early for the drive but he beats cover
full outside off and pushed firmly through the line to long-off
gets it high on the bat and he dabs it down to third man
angles it towards middle and off and he defends solidly off the meat of the bat
punches it firmly past the bowler and mid-off sprints across to intercept it
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
the shot of the innings so far, he gets a lot of width outside off and the ball is overpitched as well, he gets on his knee and scoops it high over extra cover
cuts firmly off the back foot and the ball rockets towards the fence but Kapugedera does well to slide across and cut it off
gets well forward and defends
full on middle and off and he defends
full on the pads and he pushes it through the line to long-on
angles it on the pads and it's all too easy for Raina as he works it away wide of square leg
on middle and leg and worked to the on side
once again he drifts on the pads and he works it to deep square leg
comes over the wicket, Raina plays it on to his boot and the ball rolls to the bowler
full on the pads and worked to the on side
full and wide and driven straight to Jayawardene at short cover
good length outside off and left alone

Appeal Murali deserves credit for his smart thinking, a full delivery is driven firmly back to the bowler and Murali deliberately deflects it onto the stumps, Raina's a little slow in getting his bat back in, the TV replays confirm he's safe
full outside off and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
comes round the wicket and bowls it wide, he stays at the crease and cuts to third man
flighted on off and middle, he defends
stays at the crease and pushes it past the bowler
full on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
slightly short and the ball skids through, he stays back at the crease and chops it to the covers
grants him width outside off and he slices it wide of backward point
continues over the wicket, he works off the pads to the on side against the turn
risky shot, he gets a leading edge which flies past Sangakkara
flighted down the leg side and he works it against the turn
gets forward and drive straight but Murali intercepts it and nearly catches Gambhir out of the crease
floated on the pads and worked away wide of midwicket
gets well forward and defends down the track
loses direction and drifts wide down the leg side
gets to his fifty with a streaky shot, he gets an outside edge past the keeper and the ball runs to third man, a slip would have claimed his wicket
floated on the pads and worked to the on side
drifts on middle and leg and he tucks it to the on side
flighted on ,middle and leg and he takes another single this time to midwicket
opens the face of the bat and takes a quick single to backward point
flighted on the off stump and he pushes it to mid-off
gives him the charge and he checks his shot and pushes it to the on side
charges down the track again and he beats a diving Jayawardene at short cover
lands wide outside off and keeps low, he shapes to cut but misses
drifts wide down the leg side
lands outside off and he chops it down to point
gets a bit of width outside off but he fails to pierce the off side field
he just about manages to pick the doosra before chopping it down to point
flighted on off and defended
slower through the air, he tucks it to midwicket
searches for the single to the on side but fails to beat midwicket
good improvisation from Gambhir, he makes room to a flighted delivery and carves the ball over extra cover against the turn
flighted on middle and leg and he pushes it to long-on
gets width outside off and he cuts
gets width outside off and he cuts
stays back at the crease and carves it high over short cover
flighted on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
very good improvisation there, he plays very close to the body and deliberately upper cuts it past Sangakkara, Maharoof gives the chase
timely breakthrough there for Sri Lanka, Gambhir chips down the track tries to launch him over the off side but he checks his shot and Kandamby takes it easily at long-off
full outside off and driven to long-off
gets well forward and defends to the off side
commits to the front foot and defends again
pushes it much quicker, he lunges forward and smothers the spin
the carom ball skids on his pads and he works it away wide of square leg, that should ease a bit of pressure
gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-off
lands it on middle and leg and he pushes it through the line to long-on
stays back at the crease and punches a good length ball to long-off, that's his fifty, a well-controlled knock
gets a bit of width outside off and he steers it past the slip
full on the pads and he easily nudges it past midwicket
stays on the front foot and pushes a full delivery through the line to long-off
gives him width outside off, he rocks back and stylishly cuts it to deep point
Rains waits for the turn before cutting it down to deep point
Mendis gets no turn whatsoever as Raina easily nudges it to the on side
bowls it full on the pads and he works it away easily to square leg

a communication breakdown there, Raina nudges it down to fine leg and charges out for the second run, Yuvraj is interested only in the single but when he turns around his partner is already halfway down the pitch, it's too late for Raina to get back
full on middle and defended back to the bowler
defended to the on side
gets forward and taps it to point
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
gets forward to push it to the on side but changes his mind and defends back to the bowler
he sweeps from middle and off and the ball rockets to the rope but Kapugedera does brilliantly to slide to his left and cut it off, that's amazing commitment
comes round the wicket, Dhoni takes advantage of the fact that there are no slips as he deliberately scoops it late past the keeper and short third man
gets forward and drives past the bowler
hurries him on the front foot as he defends
full on middle and leg, he taps it to the on side
the ball comes through quick and straight and he defends forward
shuffles at the crease and nearly tramples on the stumps as he whips it to square leg and snatches a quick single
that's a jaffa, he delivers a shooter from wide of the crease and nearly shaves the off stump and the outside edge
stays at the crease, picks the length and launches him over midwicket, kandamby dives in vain
takes a couple of paces down the pitch and works it against the turn to wide long-on
nudged behind square on the on side
once again he opens the face of the bat and purposely glides it wide of short third man
steps down the track and checks his shot, the ball rolls back to the bowler off his pads
defended on the front foot
full outside off, he bludgeons the off drive and Jayawardene does well to slide to his left and cut it off
thrusts forward and defends
commits to the front foot and defends again
drives with more power this time and Dilshan flings himself to his right to cut it off
full and middle and leg, he pushes it through the line to log-on
full on middle and leg and defended
comes over the wicket, he fires it low and Yuvraj has to bend fairly low to defend
strays on the pads and he nudges it off his legs to the on side
stays at the crease, waits for the ball to come on to him before punching it down to long-off
this one cuts back in and skids through, he manages to get some bat on it before punching it away
gets forward and pushes it to short extra cover, thinks of a single
punches it to short extra cover
lands it on  a good length outside off and he cuts to the off side
gets forward and defends
lunges forward and smothers the turn
Yuvraj picks the gaps in the field, he chips down the track to a flighted delivery, checks his shot but gets enough timing and elevation to find the vacant spaces at long-off
gets forward and works it off his pads towards cover, stifled appeal by Dilshan
gets forward and defends to the off side
and he gets a royal welcome, a full delivery on the off stump is crashed past the bowler with a full swing of the bat, he sticks his boot out to intercept it but in vain
this one skids through and comes back in, he gets forward and defends
hits a good length on the off stump and he taps it to the off side
nudged off his pads and leg bye called
this one stays very low and Yuvraj, who shapes to pull, just manages to place it to square leg, he doesn't know where he's bit it but goes through with the single
gets forward and steers it wide of point
lunges well forward and defends
stays on the front foot and chops it hard down to long-off
gets down to a full delivery and defends with an angled bat to cover, sets off quickly
thrusts forward and defends
gets forward and pushes a full delivery through the line to long-off
bowls it short and he swivels early and pulls it away to deep square leg, good commitment in the deep to save a boundary
makes room and punches it firmly down the pitch but the stumps get in the way
gets behind the line to a good length ball and pushes it to long-on
Appeal Pitches in line on middle and leg and the ball keeps low, Yuvraj gets a thick inside edge and Jerling shakes his head
pushes it firmly back to the bowler
fires it on the toes and he digs it out
comes on a little slower than expected as Dhoni stays at the crease and chops it to point
keeps it slightly short and Dhoni once again punches it but cannot beat the in field on the off side
fuller in length and a firm push is intercepted at extra cover
full again on the off stump and a forward push finds mid-off this time
he picks the slower ball well and waits on it before steering it wide of extra cover

Yuvraj gives it a away and a good bowling change by Sri Lanka, he makes room to loft him for six down the ground but the ball travels off the splice of the bat and as a result doesn't get the desired elevation, Murali comes forward from long-on and takes it comfortably
flights it on middle and leg and he follows the movement and paddles it wide of square leg, he puts pressure on the fielder and completes the second easily
pushes it fuller and flatter, he works it with the turn down to midwicket
the doosra, Rohit tries to work it away to the onside but luckily checks shot and prevents a leading edge
flighted on the pads and he works it with the turn to the on side
flighted on middle and off and he defends
Dhoni tries to work it across the line but doesn't pick thew slower ball well, as a result he gets an inside edge which trickles past his stumps
holds the length back outside off and he punches it down to cover
gets across his stumps and nudges it behind square on the on side and calls for the second run quickly, this is very intelligent stuff from Dhoni
good length outside off and punched to the off side
picks the slower ball a little late but does well to check his shot and defend
the leg cutter this time and he waits on it before chopping the ball wide of gully
lands it on a full length outside off and he drives to mid-off
holds the length back on middle and off and he defends solidly back to the bowler
mixes it up well with the yorker this time and Rohit just manages to dig it out
the slower ball nearly skids through the gate, Rohit manages to get bat on it but the ball clips the toe of the bat
angles it on the pads and he works it away to deep square leg
bowls another slow yorker but he pushes it away past the bowler and down to long-on with more power
full and wide outside off and he reaches out and carves it over extra cover
don't even bother chasing it, Dhoni gets a meaty half volley on the off stump and he gets all his weight behind the shot to crash it past the bowler, there's no long-off as well
holds the length back outside off and he angles it to backward point
full on the pads and pushed to long-on
bowls the slower ball and Rohit decides to defend on the front foot
another slower ball and Rohit once again safely keeps it away, India can do this in singles
he expectedly floats it on the pads and the batsman defends it away
full on the off stump and punched to the covers
gives him width outside off and holds the length back but that works to Rohit's advantage as he rocks back and punches it past extra cover
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
he oversteps and Rohit pushes it through the line to long-on
Free Hit Gives him the charge but Mendis holds the length back and Dhoni can only club it down to deep midwicket
good length outside off and pushed to the off side
angles it on middle and leg and he works it with the turn to midwicket
stays on the backfoot and there's sharp turn, he mistimes the nudge and plays it straight to midwicket
gets his front pad across to cover the turn and he nudges it to the on side
works it with the turn behind square on the on side
stays on the backfoot, waits for it to skid through before punching it to long-on
picks the doosra outside of and defends firmly to cover
pushes it quick and full and the batsman works it with the line to long-on
just exposes his stumps a bit before punching it down to long-on
clips it away close to the pads and jayawardene flings himself to his right to short midwicket to get a hand to it
strays just wide outside the legstump, he shoulders arms
floated on the pads and worked to the on side
punches it firmly towards Kulasekara at mid-off and sets off, he hits the stumps but the batsman's safe
angled on the pads and he works it with the turn to the on side
he picks the flight well, takes a couple of paces down the track and lofts him against the turn to long-off
clips it wide of square leg and they scamper through for the single
gets to his fifty with a cracker of a shot, steps down the track and crashes a full delivery past the bowler and mid-off, nobody had a chance
works it to square leg for a single
angled on the pads and he gives him the charge and pushes it firmly wide of midwicket, that's the fifty stand
steps down the pitch and tries to steal a quick single to cover, Rohit wisely sends him back
gives him the charge to a flatter delivery and whacks it along the turf past the bowler and mid-off
stays on the backfoot and cuts it to the off side
gets forward and pushes it straight to mid-off
bowls the slower ball wide down the leg side, he tries to nudge but misses
bangs it in short but he misdirects it wide outside off
bowls it on target this time as Dhoni stays on the back foot and defends
digs out a yorker just wide of Sangakkara and Rohit is determined to go ahead with this single
full on the pads and worked away wide of square leg
stays on the backfoot and defends to the off side and takes a single
gets forward and drives on the up towards cover
Thushara misdirects it on the pads and he delicately whips it away wide of square leg
angles it on the pads and he nudges it away to the on side, India win by six wickets
